summary: Changes Riften Guard outfits from stormcloak-style to witcher-style
descriptionHtml:
================
Details
================

This is an add-on intended for Witcher5688\'s Witcher2 Replace Mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22054

Whilst playing the above mod, I noticed that the Riften guards were unchanged from vanilla and that just didn\'t sit right with me. I used some assets from other Witcher mods to create this simple guard overhaul for Riften. I went for a toned-down look compared to the Witcher-style guards in other towns, as Riften always seemed like a run-down town, Additionally, some dialogue from the Jarl of Riften implies that resources are stretched thin. So I thought that guards should look less well-equipped than the guards of, say, Whiterun. Overall, I think that the style works - the guards look like they belong in Riften. I hope that you agree.

The guards wear one set of armour (cuirass, gloves and shield), one type of shield and two helmet variants. All pieces are usable by the player.

================
Requirements
================

The Witcher 2 - HD Retexture of Craftable Seltkirk Armor by geraltdirivia and Suhoi72 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10834

NOTE: You have the option of two downloads, with similar yet separate texture sets. I recommend the Suhoi72 download.

Not essential, but this mod will make most sense when used alongside the Witcher2 Replace Mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22054

================
Installation
================

Install meshes and textures from Witcher 2 - HD Retexture of Craftable Seltkirk Armor by Suhoi72 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10834

(you can download and install with NMM)

Download and install my mod with NMM is recommended, or manually extract to your date folder.

================
Installation
================

Uninstall via NMM, or manually delete the files.

================
Credit
================

This mod would not have been possible without meshes and textures from:

The Witcher 2 - HD Retexture of Craftable Seltkirk Armor by geraltdirivia and Suhoi72 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10834
Witcher 2 Shield Pack by redxavier - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7328
Witcher 2 Helmet Pack by redxavier - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7159

and finally, CD Projekt Red - developers of the Witcher 2 who have kindly allowed their meshes and textures to be used in other projects provided they are given credit.

On a personal note, I learned a lot about the Creation Kit whilst making this admittedly simple mod. CK modding is certainly not as challenging as I\'d first feared. I heartily recommend that people dive in and start modding.
author: zulu9812
